details:
noun
- any wrapper or covering
- a flat (usually rectangular) container for a letter, thin package, etc.
- the bag containing the gas in a balloon
= synonyms: gasbag
- the maximum operating capability of a system (especially an aircraft)
= example: the maximum operating capability of a system (especially an aircraft)
- a natural covering made out of liquid or gas
= example: a natural covering made out of liquid or gas
- a curve that is tangent to each of a family of curves
